Comment: If you are an American and you are pro-anything but American...then you don't belong in this country, please feel free to leave. Other nations citizens have pride and love of their own country, almost every single one of them. It is not a unique stance.  It's far past time to get back on the "love of your own fucking country" train.  You don't have to be a fanatic, and you're welcome to be critical of policy. But the flippant hatred of anything American in favor of other nations is disgusting.
